name: Bank Transactions

metadata.exclusions: No known exclusions beyond documented table/model constraints.
metadata.confidence_notes: Validated against seeded demo dataset; verify against production policies before external reporting.

business_purpose: Transaction-level payment activity used for payment analytics, fee reporting, and failure monitoring.

key_columns.name: fee_amount
key_columns.business_meaning: Fee charged for processing the transaction

key_columns.name: status
key_columns.business_meaning: Processing status such as posted, declined, or reversed

common_queries: SELECT business_date, SUM(amount) FROM bank_transactions WHERE status = 'posted' GROUP BY business_date
SELECT status, COUNT(*) FROM bank_transactions GROUP BY status
gotchas: Use status = 'posted' for settled volume; declined/reversed are not settled
